dao.db

Class CustomerDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.db.CustomerDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDAO

    public class CustomerDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerDAO
    This class implements CompanyDAO interface for basic DML functions of Company table in database. The class using for all throwables within the CouponManagementSystem
    Version:
    1.00, 28/07/2016
    Author:
    Morris Elkanaev
